title: another long shot trade will trade a t206 hofer for a signed Gary Carter 1988 SLU
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: another long shot trade will trade a t206 hofer for a signed Gary Carter 1988 SLU
posts.post_content: I have a couple of fair to good condition T206 hofers. Will trade one of them for a autographed 1988 Gary Carter Starting Lineup. Will also trade for Kirby Puckett, Chris Brown, Dan Quisenberry and Donnie Moore as well. I expect this to sink fast but always worth a shot :)
